NTD TV presents

The Seventh NTD International Piano Competition Final Round

$15 senior and student tickets are available. Call the box office at 212 501 3330. The NTD International Piano Competition (NIPC), the only world-class piano event organized by a global television network, New Tang Dynasty (NTD) Television, proudly announces its seventh edition. The…

$15 senior and student tickets are available. Call the box office at 212 501 3330. The NTD International Piano Competition (NIPC), the only world-class piano event organized by a global television network, New Tang Dynasty (NTD) Television, proudly announces its seventh edition. The…

Louis Pelosi presents

Pelosi and Pianists: Repertory and New Works

Repertory and world premiere works for piano featuring pianists Sharon Chang, Dominika Gacka and Mateusz Borowiak and composer Louis Pelosi. Sharon Chang, piano Dominika Gacka, piano Mateusz Borowiak, piano PELOSI – Twelve Miniatures CHOPIN …

Kaufman Music Center & World Music Institute Co-Present

Carlos Núñez

WORLD MUSIC INSTITUTE Few artists pack as much energy, virtuosity and charisma into their performances as multi-instrumentalist and WMI Honorary Board member Carlos Núñez. Steeped in the rich Celtic traditions of Galicia on the northwest coast of Spain where he was born and still…

(classical, season-highlights)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

Bound for Broadway

BROADWAY CLOSE UP Hosted by Liz Callaway Bound for Broadway returns with a sneak peek at some of the best new shows headed for New York's bright lights! Emmy Award-winner and Tony nominee Liz Callaway interviews some of musical theater’s most fascinating voices, followed by performances of…

(musical-theater, vocal-performance, season-highlights)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

VOCES8

GREAT VOCALISTS Nightfall Returning to Merkin Hall after sold-out performances last season, the Grammy-nominated vocal ensemble brings their signature virtuosity to repertoire from early to modern. A place inhabited by the moon and stars, by solitude, dreams, fears and prayers, the…

(classical, new-music, vocal-performance, season-highlights)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

VOCES8

GREAT VOCALISTS Flight of the Soul The celebrated vocal ensemble returns to Merkin Hall after two sold-out performances last season. VOCES8 is joined by virtuoso violinist Jack Liebeck for a program centered around Ralph Vaughn Williams’s celebrated The Lark Ascending. In a unique choral…

(classical, new-music, vocal-performance, season-highlights)

Pegasus: The Orchestra presents

Gershwin, Copland, Price & Floss

$25 student and $30 senior tickets are available. Call the box office at 212 501 3330. Pegasus: the Orchestra led by artistic director and principal conductor, Karén Hakobyan brings together twenty of its core members to present Four American masterpieces. Through history and geography,…

NY Phil Ensembles at Merkin Hall

Up Close and Personal Join Musicians of the Philharmonic for personal and intimate performances, and experience the personality of the performers. See how a small setting can amplify a huge musical event! ERIC EWAZEN – Trio for Trumpet, Violin and Piano FRANCIS POULENC…

(classical)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

Daniel Rafimayeri, violin

TUESDAY MATINEES Works by Beethoven, Wieniawski, De Falla and Janáček Violinist Daniel Rafimayeri is the 2019 Burdick-Thorne Gold medalist of the Stulberg International String Competition. An alum of NPR’s From The Top, he has performed at Carnegie Hall, Alice Tully Hall at Lincoln…

(classical, season-highlights)

(classical, new-music, season-highlights)

Music of The Beatles & More for Kids

ROCK AND ROLL PLAYHOUSE Performing songs created by the most iconic musicians in rock history, The Rock and Roll Playhouse band offers its core audience of families with children aged 1-7 games, movement, stories and most importantly, an opportunity to rock out. It allows parents to enjoy the…

(classical, new-music, season-highlights)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

Hey, Look Me Over: The Lyrics of Carolyn Leigh

BROADWAY CLOSE UP Hosted by Sean Hartley with Farah Alvin, Allison Blackwell, Charlotte Maltby, John Riddle, Alysha Umphress and Michael Winther. Evan Rees, musical director Discover the genius of Carolyn Leigh, lyricist for Peter Pan, Wildcat and Little Me, as well as hit songs like…

(musical-theater, vocal-performance, season-highlights)

Kaufman Music Center & NYFOS Co-present

New York Festival of Song: My Brother's Keeper

Conceived by baritone Justin Austin, this program tells a story of brotherly love and community among Black men in America through art song, soul, gospel and opera. "My Brother’s Keeper" features a stellar team of Black American male singers, including Austin, tenor Joshua Blue, baritone…

(classical, musical-theater, season-highlights, vocal-performance)

KAUFMAN MUSIC CENTER PRESENTS

Darius Jones: Samesoul Maker and fLuXkit Vancouver

ARTIST AS CURATOR Curated by Darius Jones Saxophonist and composer Darius Jones bridges the landscape between the New York avant-jazz scene and contemporary composition. He brings these musical worlds together for the first time at a performance featuring his two most iconic works in one night:…

(new-music, season-highlights)
